languages.text: {n}Джай скупо улыбается. Мрака в ее взгляде становится чуть меньше.{/n} "Ты умеешь смотреть сквозь маски, {name}. Это — да, это из меня не вытравить. Я — Джай Хейдари, и я люблю бунтовать против нормы в любом своем обличьи".

{n}Jae smiles thinly, but the darkness recedes slightly from her eyes.{/n} "You can see through any mask, {name}. You're right — that's one thing I can't change about myself. I'm Jae Heydari and I love rebelling against norms under any guise."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай скупо улыбается. Мрака в ее взгляде становится чуть меньше.{/n} "Ты умеешь смотреть сквозь маски, {name}. Это — да, это из меня не вытравить. Я — Джай Хейдари, и я люблю бунтовать против нормы в любом своем обличьи".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae smiles thinly, but the darkness recedes slightly from her eyes.{/n} "You can see through any mask, {name}. You're right — that's one thing I can't change about myself. I'm Jae Heydari and I love rebelling against norms under any guise."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae smiles thinly, but the darkness recedes slightly from her eyes.{/n} "You can see through any mask, {name}. You're right — that's one thing I can't change about myself. I'm Jae Heydari and I love rebelling against norms under any guise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae smiles thinly, but the darkness recedes slightly from her eyes.{/n} "You can see through any mask, {name}. You're right — that's one thing I can't change about myself. I'm Jae Heydari and I love rebelling against norms under any guise."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊勉强笑了起来，但目光中的阴霾稍稍退散了些。{/n}“无论是什么面具，都逃不过你的法眼，{name}。你说得没错，我就是这样的人，这一点我不会改变。我是婕伊·海达利，无论戴着什么面具，我都喜欢挑战规则。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae smiles thinly, but the darkness recedes slightly from her eyes.{/n} "You can see through any mask, {name}. You're right — that's one thing I can't change about myself. I'm Jae Heydari and I love rebelling against norms under any guise."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊勉强笑了起来，但目光中的阴霾稍稍退散了些。{/n}“无论是什么面具，都逃不过你的法眼，{name}。你说得没错，我就是这样的人，这一点我不会改变。我是婕伊·海达利，无论戴着什么面具，我都喜欢挑战规则。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは薄く微笑む。その目からわずかに闇が消えた。{/n}「あんたはどんな仮面でも見抜くことができるみたいだね。{name}様、あんたの言う通り、それはあたしが自分自身について変えられないことの一つだ。あたしはジェイ・ヘイダリ。どんな仮面をかぶっていても、規範に逆らうのが好きなのは隠せない」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae smiles thinly, but the darkness recedes slightly from her eyes.{/n} "You can see through any mask, {name}. You're right — that's one thing I can't change about myself. I'm Jae Heydari and I love rebelling against norms under any guise."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは薄く微笑む。その目からわずかに闇が消えた。{/n}「あんたはどんな仮面でも見抜くことができるみたいだね。{name}様、あんたの言う通り、それはあたしが自分自身について変えられないことの一つだ。あたしはジェイ・ヘイダリ。どんな仮面をかぶっていても、規範に逆らうのが好きなのは隠せない」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae sonríe débilmente, pero parte de la oscuridad abandona su mirada.{/n} «Puedes ver a través de cualquier máscara, {name}. Tienes razón: eso es algo de mí misma que no puedo cambiar. Soy Jae Heydari y me encanta rebelarme contra las normas, sea cual sea su apariencia».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae smiles thinly, but the darkness recedes slightly from her eyes.{/n} "You can see through any mask, {name}. You're right — that's one thing I can't change about myself. I'm Jae Heydari and I love rebelling against norms under any guise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae sonríe débilmente, pero parte de la oscuridad abandona su mirada.{/n} «Puedes ver a través de cualquier máscara, {name}. Tienes razón: eso es algo de mí misma que no puedo cambiar. Soy Jae Heydari y me encanta rebelarme contra las normas, sea cual sea su apariencia».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae affiche un sourire amer, mais la lumière commence à revenir dans ses yeux.{/n} « Aucun masque ne peut vous tromper, {name}. Vous avez raison ; s'il y a bien une chose que je ne pourrai jamais changer, c'est que je suis Jae Heydari et que j'adore me rebeller contre les normes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae smiles thinly, but the darkness recedes slightly from her eyes.{/n} "You can see through any mask, {name}. You're right — that's one thing I can't change about myself. I'm Jae Heydari and I love rebelling against norms under any guise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae affiche un sourire amer, mais la lumière commence à revenir dans ses yeux.{/n} « Aucun masque ne peut vous tromper, {name}. Vous avez raison ; s'il y a bien une chose que je ne pourrai jamais changer, c'est que je suis Jae Heydari et que j'adore me rebeller contre les normes. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae lächelt dich schmal an, aber ein wenig weicht die Dunkelheit aus ihren Augen.{/n} "Ich schafft es, hinter jede Maske zu schauen, {name}. Ihr habt recht – diese Sache an mir kann ich nicht ändern. Ich bin Jae Heydari und ich liebe es, mich gegen die Regeln aufzulehnen, egal in welcher Verkleidung."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae smiles thinly, but the darkness recedes slightly from her eyes.{/n} "You can see through any mask, {name}. You're right — that's one thing I can't change about myself. I'm Jae Heydari and I love rebelling against norms under any guise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae lächelt dich schmal an, aber ein wenig weicht die Dunkelheit aus ihren Augen.{/n} "Ich schafft es, hinter jede Maske zu schauen, {name}. Ihr habt recht – diese Sache an mir kann ich nicht ändern. Ich bin Jae Heydari und ich liebe es, mich gegen die Regeln aufzulehnen, egal in welcher Verkleidung."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın hafiften gülümsemesiyle gözlerindeki karanlık, bir nebze de olsa çekiliyor.{/n} "Her türlü maskenin arkasını görebiliyorsun {name}. Haklısın, kendim hakkında değiştiremeyeceğim tek şey bu. Ben Jae Heydari'yim ve hangi kılığa bürünürsem bürüneyim normlara başkaldırmayı seviyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae smiles thinly, but the darkness recedes slightly from her eyes.{/n} "You can see through any mask, {name}. You're right — that's one thing I can't change about myself. I'm Jae Heydari and I love rebelling against norms under any guise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae hafiften gülümsüyor ve gözlerindeki karanlık bir nebze de olsa çekiliyor.{/n} "Her türlü maskenin arkasını görebiliyorsun {name}. Haklısın, kendim hakkında değiştiremeyeceğim tek şey bu. Ben Jae Heydari'yim ve hangi kılığa bürünürsem bürüneyim, normlara başkaldırmayı seviyorum."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
